entry.title: CoinJoin bounty fund question
entry.summary: In June 2014, Odinn Cyberguerrilla posted a question regarding the CoinJoin bounty fund address. He was seeking information on what happens to the funds in the address. The correct place for more information was stated as the Bitcointalk forum thread where it was announced. The link to this thread is provided as https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=279249.0.
